title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4010 - Pool Calculations

§ 4010.1 - Pools-calculation and distribution
§ 4010.6 - Parlay betting

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4010

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128, 207, 227, 228, 229, 405, 909; L. 1934, ch. 310, § 6-a, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
